content: Operator: Good morning, everyone and thank you for participating in today's conference call to discuss Wayside Technology Group's Financial Results for the Second Quarter ended June 30, 2022. As reported in our earnings press release, adjusted gross billings, which is a non-GAAP measure, increased $6.7 million or 3% to $241.8 million compared to $235.1 million in the year ago quarter. Gross profit in the second quarter increased 14% to $12.5 million compared to $11 million for the three months ended June 30, 2021.
